1.0.name: wordpress/bumpin
1.0.description:
Install BumpIn Socialbar or chat widget for your wordpress and give an interaction mechanism to people visiting your website and draw more traffic to your website using bumpin Hotspots( See http://www.bumpin.com ). Following are some features of BumpIn plugin.

NOTE: Please register first at http://www.bumpin.com using the domain for your Wordpress Blog to customize your bar

Multi IM Chat: Now you can chat with your buddies on Gtalk, MSN, Yahoo, AOL from a single platform, and invite them to visit your blog.

Twitter: This feature lets the visitors show your twitter feeds at your website.

Facebook Fanpage: Now you are able to integrate your fan page (of facebook) to your blog. Your visitors have the flexibility to see your fanpage right on your blog.

Facebo
